name: Alert24 - Incident Management & Monitoring Platform
description: Comprehensive incident management platform combining monitoring (Pingdom), alerting (PagerDuty), and status pages (StatusPage.io)

backend.monitoring: External API calls for HTTP/ping checks

incidentManagement: Incident lifecycle management (create, update, escalate, resolve)
Severity levels (Critical, High, Medium, Low, Maintenance)
monitoring: HTTP/HTTPS monitoring with status code validation
alerting: Multi-channel notifications (email, SMS, voice, Slack, Teams)
teamManagement: Role-based access control (Admin, Manager, Responder, Viewer)

phases.name: Phase 1: Foundation
tasks: PostgreSQL database schema for incidents and monitoring

phases.name: Phase 2: Core Monitoring
tasks: HTTP/ping monitoring implementation with multiple regions
Check scheduling and result processing system
Status page auto-updates from monitoring results
Monitoring dashboard and check management UI

phases.name: Phase 3: Advanced Alerting
tasks: SMS and voice notification integration via Twilio
Escalation policy engine with time-based triggers
Mobile app development for incident response

phases.name: Phase 4: Advanced Features
tasks: Dependency monitoring and external service correlation

phases.name: Phase 5: Enterprise Features
tasks: Advanced security features and audit logging
Custom domain support for status pages

security.encryption: HTTPS, JWT tokens, encrypted sensitive data
security.rateLimiting: API rate limiting and abuse prevention
security.webhookSecurity: Signed webhooks and API key validation

optimizations: Caching for status pages and analytics

deployment.domains: Custom domain support for status pages

documentation.admin: Admin guides for setup and configuration

completed: User authentication (signup, login, logout) with raw SQL

NavBar with user info, sign out, and Settings link
Move organization management to the Settings page

Status page components and services management
